one_liner: A lightweight commuter e-bike with long-range battery and integrated safety tech.
battery_life: Up to 85 km per charge (Eco mode), typical 55–70 km mixed riding.
gps: Yes. Built-in GPS + anti-theft tracking in the companion app (subscription optional after 12 months).
motor: 250W rear hub motor, 45 Nm torque, pedal-assist with 5 levels.
charging_time: 0–100% in ~4.5 hours with the included fast charger.
warranty: 2-year standard warranty. Battery covered for 600 charge cycles or 2 years (whichever comes first).
shipping: Ships in 3–5 business days. Delivery in 7–10 business days (metro), 10–14 (non-metro).
returns: 14-day return window if unused; shipping fees may apply.
